016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jersey.server.resources;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
020import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
021import org.glassfish.jersey.server.ResourceConfig;
022import org.glassfish.jersey.server.ServerProperties;
023
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.util.ArrayList;
026import java.util.List;
027
028public class ServerApplication
029        extends ResourceConfig {
030    public ServerApplication(Configuration configuration) throws IOException {
031        property(ServerProperties.WADL_FEATURE_DISABLE, Boolean.TRUE);
032        property(ServerProperties.UNWRAP_COMPLETION_STAGE_IN_WRITER_ENABLE, Boolean.TRUE);
033
034        List<String> mediaTypesList = new ArrayList<>();
035        configuration.getObjectAs("jersey.server.mediaTypes", JsonElement::asMap).ifPresent(mappings ->
036        {
037            mappings.forEach((suffix, mediaType)-> mediaTypesList.add(suffix+":"+mediaType.textValue()));
038        });
039
040        String mediaTypesString = String.join(",", mediaTypesList);
041        property(ServerProperties.MEDIA_TYPE_MAPPINGS, mediaTypesString);
042
043        LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).info("Media types:\n" + mediaTypesString.replace(',', '\n'));
044    }
045}
